mapper.select: SELECT c.course_no no, c.course_name name, c.the_date thedate, c.start_time start, c.end_time end, c.capacity-(IFNULL(COUNT(ca.course_no),0)) extra FROM course c LEFT JOIN course_apply ca ON c.course_no = ca.course_no WHERE c.the_date > NOW() GROUP BY c.course_no ORDER BY c.the_date ASC LIMIT 5;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO application(id, name, furigana, mail, sex, birthday, tel, remarks, inp_date) VALUES(0, #{name}, #{furigana}, #{mail}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{tel}, #{remarks}, CURRENT_DATE())
